title: PSA to all bot/top laners
body:
Top, if you afk shove all lane, you are more then likely going to lose.
Bot, if you continue to go 0-19, you are likely to lose.
Only viable adc's right now are.... {{champion:222}} {{champion:145}} 

Stop inting.

replies.body:
God honestly stop complaining about "The enemy jungler keeps ganking while you don't!" When you're doing nothing but push and I literally can't go in.
Also, ward the bushes, please, a little bit of map awareness is all I ask.
Midlaners tend to have a little bit more of map awareness so, not touching that.

Now talk shit on your main account, not an alt.

Oh, wait, it is permbanned? Sorry to bring it up.
mad?
Comrade, are you upset?
Nothing like having a losing lane ask for a gank while they're pushed up to the enemy tower.

If you are a jungler, heres a PSA for you: If the enemy jg is camping a lane, either respond by matching it or camping a different lane. The amount of times I see it where a jung just farms despite knowing the enemy jg is permacamping a lane is staggering.

Woah i wish i knew that
Now if only games were all this textbook
Good post, don't listen to these clowns that sit on the forums just to hate comment, they're all hardstuck and looking for something to make them feel better
Literally this
GANK THE LANES
What if they die before i even clear second camp? :<

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-14T02:54:34.791+0000)
>
> What if they die before i even clear second camp? :<

you gank that lane before backing.
I said second camp, as in the camp literally  after first camp ropfl

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2019-10-14T03:31:17.909+0000)
>
> I said second camp, as in the camp literally  after first camp ropfl

nothing changes. 
you're gonna be ganking a lot.

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-14T09:17:10.524+0000)
>
> ???

the detail of you being on your second camp, its irrelevant. pick some lanes to sincerely gank pre-6 and post-6.
that is all. 
if you want to leave someone that died for a post-6 visit then sure, but don't expect them to get there without problems. 
here's one, if you picked sej right, you're gonna gank your own melee lanes pre-6 and your ranged lanes post-6.
unless everyone picks range cause it's so fucking broken all the time lol.
Cannot tell if you are trolling, or just low iq? xd

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=00010000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-14T10:21:13.194+0000)
>
> Cannot tell if you are trolling, or just low iq? xd

gank the lanes dude.
that is your only job.
figure out how to do so.
Im better then you? You don't understand the post, go somewhere else.

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=0001000000010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-14T15:05:18.053+0000)
>
> Im better then you? You don't understand the post, go somewhere else.

But do you gank the lanes?
cause if not me playing jungle would finish pretty far above you.
Ahh, your euw, you don't read english, my bad comrade

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=000100000001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-15T05:31:36.326+0000)
>
> Ahh, your euw, you don't read english, my bad comrade

ah, you're NA, you literally are unable to play the game to even a serviceable level.
my bad for expecting to have a fruitful conversation on the state of the current meta where it is gank centric more so than anything else.
gank the lanes amerifool

> [{quoted}](name=Rolànt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=soza0j31,comment-id=00010000000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-18T05:28:22.669+0000)
>
> You legit no clue what the post is about, oof.

well not anymore now that you took some 3 days to respond.
but hey this season has been all about "ganking the lanes" so you should definitely gank lanes and stop whining about feeding laners, otherwise they get to whine about feeding junglers and i have a doozy for you in that regard.
also next season is allegedly going to be more gank centric, so once more, we're getting really good at this now.
gank
the
lanes
You legit no clue what the post is about, oof.

Take all the farm in the juicy wave that's about to crash into tower, and shove the next one all the way in too. If they ping you back, mute them.

This is coming from a mid laner, the number of times my lane has been completely fucked because I die and the enemy laner gets killed by my jungler, but they don't shove my lane into tower, so my opponent comes back to catch 15 cs crashing into their tower, and I get none... well I don't know the number of times but it's very high.
I alrdy know all this not asking for tips, just tilting
afk push mid instead

PSA to anyone: kill enemies and dont die 

GGEZ
